r.s: Creates DTA files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create DTA files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [-] Fixed problems handling exchanges with seperator in money amounts other than "." (e.g. "," in German locale settings). Thanks to Mario Mueller! [*] The code part splitting up Euro and Cent was rewritten.. Thanks to Michael Hosse for inspiring this improvement! ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
